channel.title: Problem with bonuses
channel.description:
When a player has no items on them, they have a bonus of +9 for just about everything! What do I do?
Should I check client.java or item.cfg?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 09:40:01 AM[/size][hr]Can someone help me? :(
